title: Gather Project Requirements
description: Identify and document user stories, features, and functionalities that will be part of HoloMeetingSpace.

title: Design Mixed Reality User Interface (UI)
description: Create a UI design for the HoloMeetingSpace platform that allows users to easily navigate and interact in an immersive environment.

title: Develop Mixed Reality Engine
description: Create a mixed reality engine that supports rendering, spatial audio, and haptic feedback for the HoloMeetingSpace platform.

title: Integrate Real-Time Communication Services
description: Implement real-time communication services for video conferencing, voice chat, and text messaging within the HoloMeetingSpace platform.

title: Integrate Collaborative Work Tools
description: Add tools for shared document editing, whiteboard collaboration, and file sharing within the HoloMeetingSpace platform.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a thorough security audit of the HoloMeetingSpace platform to ensure user data and sessions are protected.

title: Test Functionality of HoloMeetingSpace
description: Execute comprehensive testing to verify the functionality and performance of the HoloMeetingSpace platform.

title: Deploy HoloMeetingSpace
description: Prepare and execute deployment of the HoloMeetingSpace platform on target platforms (e.g., Oculus, Magic Leap, etc.).
